author: Tan Lee Meng J:
casename: By Products Traders Pte Ltd and Another v JAK Alhadad & Co Pte Ltd
counsel: Tan Kah Hin (Choo Hin and Partners) for plaintiffs; Nor'ain bte Abu Bakar and Ruby Tan (Abu Bakar Tan Ibrahim and Partners) for defendant
tags-parsed: Contract/Breach/Subject matter under contracts for sale and purchase of property no longer existed/Vendor could not fulfil contractual obligations to transfer property/Whether deposits paid under contracts refundable
